-- Create views using OPENROWSET with actual file paths
CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_customers AS 
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adls4salesdata.blob.core.windows.net/transformed-data/customers_clean.parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS customers;
GO

CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_products AS 
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adls4salesdata.blob.core.windows.net/transformed-data/products.parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS products;
GO
